data.name: Turtles Demo
data.detailed_description:
Join our official discord


About the Game

Support us by Wishlisting:



Bonnie the cute little turtle has just hatched. She must face the dangers of life and get to the sea. Take control of Bonnie and all the other cute turtles on the beach and help as many of them as possible to get to the sea.

Turtles! is an action-puzzle game that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the end.

We have been inspired by two of the pillars of arcade games: Frogger and Choplifter.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WIP

The game is in work-in progress. Right now in a Prototype version. We are porting it from 2d to 3d and are working hard on making it better!

data.short_description: In this action-puzzle game, you take control of Bonnie and all the other cute turtles and help as many of them as possible to get to the sea.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
